content_descriptors.notes:
This application contains sexual violence, crime, nudity and sexual content.
Specifically, the following contents are included.
・The male and female protagonists are imprisoned by bad guys.
・A man and a woman are forced to have sex under the orders of a bad guy.
・A woman is sexually tortured while tied to a chair.
・A woman is tied to a chair and subjected to electric torture.
・A woman is forced to provide sexual services to a man under the orders of a bad guy.
・A woman defecates in front of a man (only in the sentence).

fullgame.name: Nade Nade Onna no Ko 7: Imprisonment Sex Story
